title: SumSoc Customs!

embed.description: Hello Summoners, Welcome to our weekly SumSoc Customs! Event details: Date: 2/1/2018 Time: 7pm (AEST) Theme: Standard 5V5 customs on Summoners...

body:
Hey Summoners,

If you want to take a break from the grind, come and join the Summons Society Customs!

Every Tuesday we play a different type of custom game to keep things interesting. They're novelty game modes, and open to players of all skill levels. The only requirement is that you jump on our discord (https://discord.gg/kUJNWyQ) and follow the Summoner's Code!
Check the link provided for more details
